Question
========

A person achieves a score of 10.1 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 14.7 with a standard deviation 2.2. The z-score of the person with 10.1 right is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -3.12
* -2.09
* -0.96

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 3.12: Incorrect
-2.09: Correct
-0.96: Incorrect
